competitors.name: Oracle

competitors.name: SAP

competitors.name: CentralSquare Technologies
competitors.notes: Public safety and administration software, formed from Superion and Aptean merger

competitors.name: Accela
competitors.notes: Civic engagement and government management software

context: In 2020, Tyler Technologies maintained leadership in state and local government software. The pandemic accelerated government digital transformation and cloud adoption. CentralSquare Technologies, formed from the 2018 merger of Superion and TriTech Software, was a key competitor in public safety software. Tyler's acquisition strategy continued to expand its comprehensive government solution suite. The shift to remote government services created new opportunities for cloud-based solutions.
